word_mean_info__list.difference: 指对不同意见、批评或控诉作出迅速、有力的回答，即“反驳”。
正式用词，指即刻的，以口头或行动对外来的号召、请求或刺激等作出回答或响应。
正式用词，从本义“归来，回去”引申作“回答、答辨”讲时，含反驳或反唇相讥之意。
常用词，指用书面、口头或行动对他人的请求、询问、质问等作出回答或反应。
较正式用词，较少用于口语。侧重经过考虑的较正式答复。
作“回答”解，用得较少，也同to 搭配。如：He quickly responded to the question. (他很快就回答了问题。)另外，respond还可表“对……反应”，“响应”。
是常用词，后可接letter(回信)，question(回答问题)，doorbell(开门)，telephone(接电话)，advertisement(应征广告)等。
较正式，一般只作不及物动词，可与to连用。如：He has replied to my letter.(他回答了我信中提的问题。)

word_group.brief_definition: 答复, 回应, 响应
立即回复；尽快答复；立即答复
立即响应；立即做出回应

bilingual.source: He did not respond to my question.
Please respond to the invitation by Friday.
He was quick to respond with a witty remark.
bilingual.target: 他很快用机智的言辞回应。

bilingual.source: We need to respond to the customer's complaint.
bilingual.target: 我们需要回应客户的投诉。

bilingual.source: He refused to respond to the calumny against him.
bilingual.target: 他拒绝回应针对他的诽谤。

bilingual.source: He shook his head limply, unable to respond.
bilingual.target: 他无力地摇了摇头，无法回应。

bilingual.source: She didn't know how to respond to his question.
bilingual.target: 她不知道如何回应他的问题。

bilingual.source: Please respond to this emergency as soon as possible.
bilingual.target: 请尽快回应这个紧急情况。

bilingual.source: Make sure to respond appropriately to the customer's complaints.
bilingual.target: 确保适当地回应客户的投诉。

bilingual.source: You don't need to respond to me with sarcastic ridicule.
bilingual.target: 你不必用尖酸刻薄的语气来回应我。

yingyinNormal.en: They don't respond to voice commands. They do respond to mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 语音指令对他们无效？他们回应了我的。

yingyinNormal.en: No, we need to respond to Russia directly, not waste our time with Israel.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行，我们得直接回应俄罗斯，而不是跟以色列浪费时间。

yingyinNormal.en: I called for the pairs audition, and you didn't respond. Free period is now over.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我问了对唱的试镜，你没有回应，自由活动的时间到了。

yingyinNormal.en: We need to respond. Thank you, Peeta Mellark, for these revelations about the real Mockingjay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须做出回应。谢谢你，皮塔·麦拉克，谢谢你对真正的嘲笑鸟的真情流露。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't know how to respond to that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我词穷了。

yingyinNormal.en: What did she say? She didn't respond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她说什么了？她没有理我们。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir? We need to respond to strength with strength.
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生？我们得以暴制暴。

yingyinNormal.en: This is now a CIA military op. You're indemnified. Respond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 必须采取中情局军事行动，你不必负法律责任，快行动！

yingyinNormal.en: It has to come from her. That's what people respond to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一切都要发自她内心，这样人们才会有共鸣。

yingyinNormal.en: You did not respond to reason! So now, you will know fear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 既然你们敬酒不吃，那就等着吃罚酒。

yingyinNormal.en: It seems you didn't hear me after all. I don't respond to threats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来你到底是没听到。我不向威胁低头。

yingyinNormal.en: They're gonna get inside your head and watch how you respond to fear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们会进入你的大脑观察你对恐惧的反应。

yingyinNormal.en: So it all depends on how you respond to my next two words. Impress me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么这全取决于你对我下面说的三个字的反应，打动我。

yingyinNormal.en: Coin's called a meeting. We need to respond. When did "We" Become you and Coin?
yingyinNormal.zh: 科因召集开会了，我们得反击。你什么时候跟科因是一伙的了。

yingyinNormal.en: Usually when everything is normal, people don't respond in perfectly rehearsed unison.
yingyinNormal.zh: 通常当一切正常时，人们不会回答得这么一致，像排练过一样。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, the Russians don't respond well to weakness. Now that they know that the president...
yingyinNormal.zh: 先生，俄国人是见软就欺，现在他们知道总统……

yingyinNormal.en: He didn't respond to my E-mail, his phone number is unlisted. Tell me what my other option was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没回复我的邮件，我又不知道他的电话，那我还能怎么办。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not sure how to respond, Leonard. I don't own Amy. Can't own a person. At least not since...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不确定该怎么回答，莱纳德。艾米又不是我的人，我也不能拥有某个人，至少从什么时候开始不能呢？

yingyinNormal.en: And what's your next move? Trying to figure out how to respond to this. I got it a couple hours ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的下一步是什么? 想想怎么回复这个，几个小时前收到的。

yingyinNormal.en: The Defense Department's new team of doctors, nurses and trainers will respond quickly if called upon to help.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国防部新的医护团队，包括医生，护士和培训人员如果有地方需要帮助将做出快速反应。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: act or behave in reaction to someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, grade forgiveness is just another way that universities are <highlight>responding</highlight> to consumers' expectations for higher education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，分数宽恕只是大学回应消费者对高等教育期望的另一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: We more than ever need people in the workplace who can take initiative and exercise their imagination "to <highlight>respond</highlight> to unexpected events".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们比以往任何时候都更需要在工作场所中能够主动并发挥想象力来“应对突发事件”的人。

examination_example.sentence: And I felt like that again, to a certain degree, when people <highlight>responded</highlight> to the blog so well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，当人们对博客的反应如此之好时，我又有了这种感觉。

examination_example.sentence: Fewer artist than scientists <highlight>responded</highlight> to the Nature poll, however, several respondents noted that artists do not simply assist scientists with their communication requirements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对《自然》杂志的民意调查做出回应的艺术家比科学家更少，然而，一些受访者指出，艺术家不只是帮助科学家满足他们的交流需求。

examination_example.sentence: Nearly 40% of the roughly 350 people who <highlight>responded</highlight> to an accompanying poll said, they had collaborated with artists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在对随附民意调查作出回应的大约350人中，近40%的人表示他们曾与艺术家合作。

examination_example.sentence: Are we studying that text and trying to <highlight>respond</highlight> in a way that fulfils the requirement of a given course?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们是否在研究该文本，并试图以符合某一课程要求的方式来回答？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: react quickly or positively to a stimulus or treatment

examination_example.sentence: The rational part of the mind controls the information from the primitive core and makes its own decision as to how to <highlight>respond</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大脑的理性部分控制着来自原始内核的信息，并自行决定如何反应。

examination_example.sentence: People <highlight>respond</highlight> to incentives such as traffic laws that are actually enforced.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们对实际执行的交通法规等激励做出反应。

examination_example.sentence: Civilian aviation is being disrupted, by the pressing need to <highlight>respond</highlight> to a changing climate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 民航正在受到干扰，因为人们迫切需要对变化的气候做出反应。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) act or behave in reaction to someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Ahmed Bouchfaa, who claimed to work for Louis Vuitton, <highlight>responded</highlight> that the brand holds sales of old stock for staff twice a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自称在路易威登工作的Ahmed Bouchfaa回答说，该品牌每年为员工举行两次旧货销售。

examination_example.sentence: Food manufacturers are <highlight>responding</highlight> to the report with new labels, aiming to give their products a competitive edge and bolster profits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食品制造商正在用新的标签对该报告作出回应，旨在使他们的产品具有竞争优势并提高利润。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) act or behave in reaction to someone or something

examination_example.sentence: We do not <highlight>respond</highlight> to every candidate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不会一一回应每位候选人。

examination_example.sentence: The homeowner called to say that the parents had <highlight>responded</highlight> to the recordings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 房主打电话说，这对父母对这些录音做出了回应。

sense_info_list.en: react quickly or positively to a stimulus or treatment

examination_example.sentence: Biologist Kristin syas the plan is to see how the birds <highlight>respond</highlight> to the multi-colored road this summer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生物学家克里斯汀·西阿斯计划在今年夏天观察鸟类对这条五颜六色的道路有何反应。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) act or behave in reaction to someone or something

examination_example.sentence: And he didn’t wait for the flower to <highlight>respond</highlight> （回应）.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有等那朵花回应。

examination_example.sentence: In our daily life, we know well how to act and <highlight>respond</highlight> (答复) to people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们的日常生活中，我们非常清楚如何对待和回应他人。

examination_example.sentence: Just like human teachers, Bill is able to immediately <highlight>respond</highlight> to the students' questions and opinions about the topic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像人类老师一样，比尔能够立即回应学生们关于这个话题的问题和意见。

sense_info_list.en: react quickly or positively to a stimulus or treatment

examination_example.sentence: Your child might get out of bed and walk around as if he's awake, but he won't <highlight>respond</highlight> normally to you or anything.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的孩子可能会下床走动，就像他醒着一样，但他不会对你或任何事情做出正常的反应。

examination_example.sentence: It allows Bill to <highlight>respond</highlight> more quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这使得比尔能够更快地做出反应。
